document.full_text: the french government said the number of foreign direct investments rose 22 percent last year, to 782 projects creating 31,000 jobs. it was the highest number in 15 years.
document.title: france sees surge in foreign investments
lines_and_colors: the french government said the number of foreign direct investments rose 22 percent last year, to 782 projects creating 31,000 jobs. it was the highest number in 15 years.
